website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not the best choice for heavy-duty jobs, it's worth considering for anyone who prefers a mild, versatile cleaner with no fumes or sprays.
pros: A paste-like formula that is a good alternative to aerosol and spray cleaners
Safe to use on multiple surfaces
cons: Not best for tough jobs like built-up grease or burned-on food

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh mazing.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a product that gets stainless and aluminum shiny and pretty. I have some collectable hammered aluminum trays and bowls and cleaning them with this allows me to display them with pride. This was my second purchase. It lasts a long time and is good for any kind of stainless or aluminum. It cleans other stuff too. My stove top looks amazing after using it. It's some sort of heat proof black enamel paint. I'd get it again if I ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a gift. She has been using it for a long time and swears by it to clean ovens and cookware easily and make them shine. I thought she would love to have the package deal and she did! It is almost like getting 3 for the price of 2 plus the additional items that come with the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up the bottom of aluminum or non-stick pans really good.
customer_reviews.author: moskqq

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Have used Astonish for many years. It’s the best cleaner I know of.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hawck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for glass top stoves.
customer_reviews.text: Used this before. Lasts a long time as. Only needed for my glass stove top when it gets hard to remove spills on it. Doesn't scratch. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most efficient cleaner I’ve ever used. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rhicam

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this product for years. I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years. I keep finding more uses for it all the time. It is getting a little difficult to find lately.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great it makes my pots and pans shine and cleans my farmhouse sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works so well on everything.
customer_reviews.text: If you have not tried this item then do you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark frazier

customer_reviews.title: Used sent as new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this new (I’ve purchased before in the store). It came used and old. This is unacceptable. It was dried up as you can see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Will keep on using for as long as you have it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used for years I recommend it to anyone I love it because it works
customer_reviews.author: EvE

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on ceramic stove tops and burnt cooking pans. Less is more, you don’t need allot.
customer_reviews.author: AuntAng

customer_reviews.title: no scratches
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite product for cleaning my stove. It dissolves the stuck on grease and does not scratch my black stove. I also use it on my sink and it leaves everything shining and clean. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wolters

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product,we used it to clean our stove
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ross

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing for glass top cooking surfaces. So easy and it’s the best cleaner ever.
customer_reviews.author: purple

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a number of years after seeing and buying buying it from a TV shopping network. Electric range cook tops get very hot and spills really bake onto the glass finish. This product will not scratch the surface, but does remove even difficult burnt on spills. However, it does require some effort to remove them. But, for the trade off between a not very effective cleaner and some elbow grease that won't harm the surface and removes the burn on spills, there is no contest
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: cleans pots and apliances adn counters. tubes and mirrored, glass
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kay Summerford

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Buy every couple of months. Keeps mt stainless steel pits looking brand nee instead of 20 years old. Very effective at removing baked on items. Use on ss stove when it gets water marks or looks dingy.
customer_reviews.author: Strshine

customer_reviews.title: Restores crock pot to new!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to clean my crock pot. It does a perfect job.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mountfort

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfying product
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I tries lots of thing to clean my cookware. Vinegar, baking soda but not really worked. As i receive the item i cleaned right away. Easy to clean. Very satisfying !! Now my all the pots are shiny! But scent is bit strong. So i rinsed with bit of detergent again
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Astonish for 30+ years, and it is the only product I have ever found to work on any type of stain. I use it for everything from our grill to stovetop, pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean the sides of skillets that were not all that soiled. This product is an expensive form of Comet powder cleaner and, like Comet, relies on lots of hard scrubbing. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I even bought some for my daughters homes.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product/poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: This container was cracked and some of the polish was dried . Once I transferred to another container it works great
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: It takes very little effort and cleans beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner for anything. Friends are amazed that my pots and pans look like new after several years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nina
